title: Trusting Her Hero
description: 𝐇𝐞'𝐬 𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐭𝐨 𝐬𝐚𝐯𝐞 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐭𝐨𝐰𝐧. 𝐁𝐮𝐭 𝐜𝐚𝐧 𝐡𝐞 𝐚𝐥𝐬𝐨 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐡𝐞𝐫?Detective Wilder Coleman left Fisher Springs ten years ago a shattered man thanks to his ex, Kate. Now he's back, undercover, to find the man that wants to blow up the town.Except the real bomb is the one dropped on him when he learns the truth of what really happened that night.Kate Loprete's business is on the cusp of taking off. But her world is thrown upside down when her ex, Wilder, returns to town.He's returned under questionable circumstances and she's not sure if she can trust him.When the truth comes out, it threatens to destroy everything she's worked so hard to build.Now Wilder wants a second chance to make things right.
author: Danielle Pays
